description: The incredible Sony Playstation 3 combines multiple state-of-the-art technologies, for unrivaled gaming and entertainment. It accepts Blu-Ray discs, the new medium that stores up to 54GB -- delivering entertainment content in full high-definition (HD) quality. It also supports high quality display in resolution of 1080p as standard -- a far superior picture compared to 720p & 1080i. The advanced Cell processor, RSX graphics processor and high-definition picture quality means graphics you've only ever imagined become possible: Character movement is far more realistic, landscapes are rendered in real-time and expansive, cinematic storylines seem more real than ever. New online features and the simple Cross Media Bar tool make it simple to manage your digital media: Play games, watch movies and download new content more simply than ever. The PS3 is an overwhelming home entertainment experience -- the most advanced ideas in home entertainment, all in one console.   20GB 2.5 Serial ATA hard drive    Supports Blu-ray Discs, plus a wide variety of DVD and CD formats   HDMI output    4 USB 2.0 ports    Gigabit ethernet port -- 10BASE-T, 100BASE-TX, 1000BASE-T    Bluetooth 2.0 (EDR) support for up to 7 simultaneous controllers    A/V output -  480i, 480p, 720p, 1080i, 1080p   Sound -  Dolby 5.1 ch, DTS   Controls up to 7 wireless Bluetooth controllers    Backwards compatible with Playstation and PS2 games    Includes one wireless controller    Dimensions -  3.9   12.8   10.8 (9.8   32.5   27.4 cm)   Weight -  Approx. 11 lbs. (5 kg)
